Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Contains information about changes made to the activity associated with the designer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](../../add/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
When changes are made to an activity associated with a designer, the ActivityChangedEventArgs will contain information about the change.
